meta.description: Language labels for backend labels belonging to extension 'sf_register'

languageKey.label: defines in edit mode if the fields get filled with data of logged in user
comma separated list of words used in bad word validator
show the edit form after saving the create or edit form
Mode of password encryption
use encrypted filename to deny direct access on uploaded files
wether an user needs to activate his account
wether an admin needs to activate the user account
wether an user get an notification about the creation of the account. If an activation email was send this wont be send afterwards.
wether an admin get an notification about the creation of an user account. If an activation email was send this wont be send afterwards.
usergroup set if an account waits for activation
usergroup set if the account was activate
usergroup set if no activation is needed
Name of the site used in email subject
from name used in email to user
from email used in email to user
reply name used in email to user
reply email used in email to user
to name used in email to admin
to email used in email to admin
from name used in email to admin
from email used in email to admin
reply name used in email to admin
reply email used in email to admin
Sysfolder that contains the usergroups and users if not set zero or a selected value in the plugin will be used for storing the user
